page.title: 19TOURISM KIRKBY MALZEARD AREA
page.content: On the fringe of the Dales, this area has much to offer:fine views and quiet stone-cottaged villages attract a range of tourists from{Ramblers}to {residential visitors.}Though seasonal tourism adds to the local economy. Grewelthorpe offers a variety of accommodation: bed & breakfast is available at{Hackfall & Crown Inns, with bar meals for passing trade. The {Nook & Plover Hall farm}also attract domestic bed & breakfasts. 9{holiday {cottages}may be rented & 4 more are in preparation.{Newholme Farm}is a site for 30{caravans}to which many owners return year after year. Kirkby Malzeard offers similar tourist facilities: A 5 berth site for {touring caravans}lies off the main street, 5{holiday cottages}are for rent and Bed & Breakfast is offered at the{Queens Head & Dunnet cottage.
